articles.title: Rupee Falls 9 Paise To Settle At Lifetime Low Of 83.22 Against US Dollar - NDTV Profit
articles.description: The Rupee depreciated for the fourth straight day and settled 9 paise lower at its lifetime low of 83.22 (provisional) against the US dollar on Thursday amid a firm American currency and elevated crude oil prices.
articles.content:
Rupee depreciated for the 4th straight day by 9 paise, reaching a lifetime low of 83.22 to the dollar
